Name: DanceFlower
Notes: A flower-like enemy that moves around in a twirling motion. They attack by turning into a flower that spins around rapidly. If no path is assigned, it will only spin in place. It can be defeated by all of the player's attacks.

Rail.Description: The optional path that it can move on.

Player2Targetable.Description: Can be targeted, frozen and attacked by player 2.

YoshiTargetable.Description: Can be targeted and eaten by Yoshi.

SearchTurtle.Description: Red Koopa Shells and Gold Shells home in on this object.
